chapters.title: Chapter 22: Out of Thin Air
chapters.info: Yurian Stonebow, p. 433 (499)—False Dragon of an era before the Trolloc Wars. Six Aes Sedai attempted to capture him; he killed three of them and captured the rest himself. He was born in Fel Moreina, which is now called Far Madding. See also Dragon, The; Dragon Reborn.
